title: Astral Phoenix Gaming Recruit's D2-D1+ For Major League
body:
Hello summoners,

we are the Astral Phoenix Gaming a brand new multigaming born less than 6 months ago
that seeks players for qualify in the second Italian major league of League Of Legends.
We have an amazing staff , everybody coming from a previous experience in the competetive
league scenario withi multiple years on their back of pro player's and non the less as prooved
staff ( coach,analyst,mental coach,manager ecc..).

We are constatly evolving and we are here to emerge from the ashes to start and new competitive scenario.

What we are looking for from you is a minimum rank elo of D1-D2++ , free afternoons and/or free nights 
(schedule can be changed in necessity of the team), we are looking for TOP and Bottomlane position's
( if you are a settled bottlane that plays already together its a plus! ).

All the detail's from the role,skills and personality are discussed in the format (.doc) attached that you have to fill in to apply.
After that if you match our requisites we will take further action and contact you for a first interview and maybe a trial.

For other further inquires feel free to contact me anytime in game at my ign : Supa G or at astralphoenixgaming@gmail.com

Format that you have to fill in : https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSedmoey7rKdUeyUwKI7B4Zmi5ZW8a-madSqoIl5VHQL0DHzWQ/viewform

Website : https://www.facebook.com/Astral-Phoenix-Gaming-417173135518035/

" From Ashes We Rise Again "

-  Gabriel "Supa G" Amorfini Team Manager APG
